channel.title: Project insanity compiler:
channel.description:
Guys, I have this as my PROJECT INSANITY (PI) Compiler and im using a x64. : @echo off title Building Files javac -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java pause
and when i compile, i get this error:
javac: file not found: Java\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .
What should i do? Whats wrong with my compiler?

item.title: Project insanity compiler:
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

There are no Java source files in the ‘Java’ folder. If the compiler is in the same place as the Java files, you don’t the ‘Java/’ part in the path.

If there are no Java sources files where the compiler is, correct the path.

Read full topic

item.title: Project insanity compiler:
item.dc:creator: @bobby_Vegas bobby_Vegas
item.description:
@bobby_Vegas wrote:

Guys,
I have this as my PROJECT INSANITY (PI) Compiler and im using a x64. :
@echo off
title Building Files
javac -d ./Class/ Java/.java Java/sign/.java
pause

and when i compile, i get this error:

javac: file not found: Java*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

What should i do? Whats wrong with my compiler?

Read full topic
